actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

official_title: To amend the Inspector General Act of 1978 to prohibit an acting Inspector General from serving in more than one position in the Federal Government.
short_title: Demanding Unconditional Accountability under the Law for Inspectors General Act
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

summary.text:
Demanding Unconditional Accountability under the Law for Inspectors General Act or the DUAL IG Act

This bill prohibits a person serving as an acting inspector general from performing the functions and duties of another position within the government.

titles.title: Demanding Unconditional Accountability under the Law for Inspectors General Act
To amend the Inspector General Act of 1978 to prohibit an acting Inspector General from serving in more than one position in the Federal Government.
